attributes.action: To Save the Princess Marina, RAF home in Rustington, West Sussex, from closing
attributes.additional_details: The reasons for asking the government to do something is because to many promises  are made and never followed through. We need to look after our serving members in the military along with all off our veterans. This venue is in a prime position with great views of the sea, sports facility locally along with plenty of safe walking spaces.
attributes.background: I would like to see the government step in to stop this venue from closing and turn it or assist into turning it into a Army, Navy and RAF rehabilitation venue and a drop in centre..

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the UK Government or House of Commons are responsible for.

The Princess Marina House was the RAF Benevolent Fund's care and respite centre, so decisions about it were a matter for the RAF Benevolent Fund, not the Government or House of Commons.
